verses.verse: דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> The words קֹהֶ֣לֶת <WH6953> of the Preacher בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

הֲבֵ֤ל <WH1892> Vanity הֲבָלִים֙ <WH1892> of vanities אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith קֹהֶ֔לֶת <WH6953> the Preacher הֲבֵ֥ל <WH1892> vanity הֲבָלִ֖ים <WH1892> of vanities הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> All הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> all [is] vanity

מַה־ <WH4100> What יִּתְר֖וֹן <WH3504> What profit לָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> hath a man בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲמָל֔וֹ <WH5999> of all his labour שֶֽׁיַּעֲמֹ֖ל <WH5998> which he taketh תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

דּ֤וֹר <WH1755> [One] generation הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> passeth away וְד֣וֹר <WH1755> and [another] generation בָּ֔א <WH935> comes וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> but the earth לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever עֹמָֽדֶת׃ <WH5975> abideth

וְזָרַ֥ח <WH2224> also ariseth הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun וּבָ֣א <WH935> goeth down הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> and the sun וְאֶ֨ל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> to his place שׁוֹאֵ֛ף <WH7602> and hasteth זוֹרֵ֥חַֽ <WH2224> where he arose ה֖וּא <WH1931> he שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

הוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> goeth אֶל־ <WH413> toward דָּר֔וֹם <WH1864> toward the south וְסוֹבֵ֖ב <WH5437> and turneth about אֶל־ <WH413> toward צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> unto the north סוֹבֵ֤ב ׀ <WH5437> swirling סֹבֵב֙ <WH5437> turning הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> it whirleth about continually הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> The wind וְעַל־ <WH5921> and סְבִיבֹתָ֖יו <WH5439> according to his circuits שָׁ֥ב <WH7725> returneth again הָרֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> and the wind

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַנְּחָלִים֙ <WH5158> All the rivers הֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> run אֶל־ <WH413> into הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> into the sea וְהַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> yet the sea אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> is not מָלֵ֑א <WH4392> [is] not full אֶל־ <WH413> to מְק֗וֹם <WH4725> unto the place שֶׁ֤הַנְּחָלִים֙ <WH5158> from whence the rivers הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <WH1980> come שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> There הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like שָׁבִ֖ים <WH7725> thither they return לָלָֽכֶת׃ <WH1980> flow

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> All things יְגֵעִ֔ים <WH3023> [are] full of labour לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> cannot אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man לְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> utter לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor תִשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> is not satisfied עַ֙יִן֙ <WH5869> [it] the eye לִרְא֔וֹת <WH7200> with seeing וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor תִמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> filled אֹ֖זֶן <WH241> nor the ear מִשְּׁמֹֽעַ׃ <WH8085> with hearing

מַה־ <WH4100> how long שֶּֽׁהָיָה֙ <WH1961> has been ה֣וּא <WH1931> he שֶׁיִּהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> has been וּמַה־ <WH4100> how long שֶׁנַּֽעֲשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> The thing that hath been it [is that] which shall be and that which is done ה֖וּא <WH1931> he שֶׁיֵּעָשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> [is] that which shall be done וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner חָדָ֖שׁ <WH2319> and [there is] no new תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> [thing] under the sun

יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> Is there דָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> [any] thing שֶׁיֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> whereof it may be said רְאֵה־ <WH7200> See זֶ֖ה <WH2088> this חָדָ֣שׁ <WH2319> fresh ה֑וּא <WH1931> he כְּבָר֙ <WH3528> already הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> has existed לְעֹֽלָמִ֔ים <WH5769> of old time אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> has existed מִלְּפָנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH6440> which was before

אֵ֥ין <WH369> There זִכְר֖וֹן <WH2146> [There is] no remembrance לָרִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <WH7223> of former וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> and also לָאַחֲרֹנִ֜ים <WH314> of [things] that are to come שֶׁיִּהְי֗וּ <WH1961> will occur לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> will come לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like זִכָּר֔וֹן <WH2146> [things] neither shall there be [any] remembrance עִ֥ם <WH5973> Among שֶׁיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> will occur לָאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> with [those] that shall come after פ
אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I קֹהֶ֗לֶת <WH6953> I the Preacher הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> have been מֶ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> was king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וְנָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> And I gave אֶת־ <WH853> לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> my heart לִדְר֤וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek וְלָתוּר֙ <WH8446> and search out בַּֽחָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> by wisdom עַ֛ל <WH5921> concerning כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> concerning all [things] that are done תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> under heaven ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> he עִנְיַ֣ן <WH6045> travail רָ֗ע <WH7451> this sore נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> given אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> hath God לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man לַעֲנ֥וֹת <WH6031> to be exercised בּֽוֹ׃

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽמַּעֲשִׂ֔ים <WH4639> all the works שֶֽׁנַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> that are done תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold הַכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> and behold all [is] vanity וּרְע֥וּת <WH7469> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit

מְעֻוָּ֖ת <WH5791> [That which is] crooked לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> cannot לִתְקֹ֑ן <WH8626> be made straight וְחֶסְר֖וֹן <WH2642> and that which is wanting לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> cannot לְהִמָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH4487> be numbered

דִּבַּ֨רְתִּי <WH1696> I communed אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I עִם־ <WH5973> with לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> with mine own heart לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold הִגְדַּ֤לְתִּי <WH1431> Lo I am come to great estate וְהוֹסַ֙פְתִּי֙ <WH3254> and have gotten חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> more wisdom עַ֛ל <WH5921> more כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> than all [they] that have been before עַל־ <WH5921> than יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> me in Jerusalem וְלִבִּ֛י <WH3820> yea my heart רָאָ֥ה <WH7200> experience הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> had great חָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> of wisdom וָדָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> and knowledge

וָאֶתְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> And I gave לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> my heart לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> to know חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> wisdom וְדַ֥עַת <WH3045> and to know הוֹלֵל֖וֹת <WH1947> madness וְשִׂכְל֑וּת <WH5531> and folly יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> I perceived שֶׁגַּם־ <WH1571> that this זֶ֥ה <WH2088> this ה֖וּא <WH1931> he רַעְי֥וֹן <WH7475> also is vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of spirit

כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> For in much חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> wisdom רָב־ <WH7227> in abundance כָּ֑עַס <WH3708> grief וְיוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> and he that increaseth דַּ֖עַת <WH1847> knowledge יוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> increaseth מַכְאֽוֹב׃ <WH4341> sorrow
